item.title: Dumping rubble on public Elmstone Hardwicke Bridleway 2., 17th December
item.description:
Sam Steel, a local developer whose last planning application was turned down is dumping rubble and hardcore on the public bridleway causing obstruction and damage. It's not proper hardcore. Looks like stuff from a building site and contains glass /rubber gloves etc. The family at number 6 foster severely disabled children and now can't use it for wheelchairs. Dangerous for dogs and difficult for horses. This can't be legal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tredington Park, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
